  16. (* Abstract Syntax Tree for the Tests Specification Language *)

  18. ‌type 'a located = {
  19.   node : 'a;
  20.   loc : Location.t
  21. }

  23. ‌type environment_statement =
  24.   | Assignment of bool * string located * string located (* variable = value *)
  25.   | Append of string located * string located (* variable += value *)
  26.   | Include of string located (* include named environment *)
  27.   | Unset of string located (* clear environment variable *)

  29. ‌type tsl_item =
  30.   | Environment_statement of environment_statement located
  31.   | Test of
  32.     int (* test depth *) *
  33.     string located (* test name *) *
  34.     string located list (* environment modifiers *)

  36. ‌type tsl_block = tsl_item list

  38. ‌val make_identifier : ?loc:Location.t -> string -> string located
  39. ‌val make_string : ?loc:Location.t -> string -> string located
  40. ‌val make_environment_statement :
  41.   ?loc:Location.t -> environment_statement -> environment_statement located
